Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Dark ruby color with rich cabernet notes of black cherries, anise and dark fruit. The wine is thick, mouth filling and rounds out in the middle.

Name: Bonnie Jean Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It is floral and spice focused. Juicy and plush with dried blueberry, black cherry, marionberry and hints of warm spices, including nutmeg and cardamom.

Name: Tortoniano Barolo
Wine Description: Colour: garnet red with bright reflections Aroma: engaging, ethereal and complex, hints of withered roses, juniper and delicate spices Taste: ample, harmonious and aristocratic.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: A wine with a beautiful dark color, with purple reflections. On the nose, we are seduced by the intensity and the purity of the fruit,by the discrete perception of the aromas coming from the ageing in barrels, by the touch of velvet that bring so much complexity. On the palate, the charm continue to operate. The wine is perfectly balanced, fleshy, round, structured, but still dominated by this finese and precision that makes it accessible. The finish is long with hints of sweetness, fruit paste, and sweet spices.

Name: Spirithouse Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Fresh red cherry, cranberry and the waft of late summer is brought together with warm baking spices and faint rooibos tea. The beautifully linear and chiseled acidity is embraced with silky, ethereal tannin leading to a long, generous finish.

Name: Pomerol
Wine Description: Definite blackberry, licorice, tea and oak, with a little touch of earth and leather. It's a complex wine that's incredibly well balanced, with just the right acidity and tannins to make it feel vibrant and alive through the strong finish.

Name: Diamond Mountain Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has cassis and anise notes are framed by a touch of oak character. On the palate the wine is quite full and rich, with smooth tannins typical for a mature Cabernet made from these mountain-grown grapes.

Name: Clay Court Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A bright ruby gem, notes of Italian plums, violet and black pepper on the nose leads to a palate bursting with cassis, raspberry, black currant and carmelized marmalade. Finishes rich and savory with woodsy tones of cedar.

Name: Hartford Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Hartford Vineyard's low-yielding vines produce elegant Zinfandel characterized by a sumptuous and velvety texture. Boysenberry, anise and East Asian spice aromas transition into ripe black raspberry and mulberry flavors with a cinnamon stick finish. Well-integrated tannins juxtapose juicy flavors and an opulent texture.

Name: Hawks Butte Syrah
Wine Description: It has Profoundly aromatic with copious red apple, rose petal and California bay, it offers a harmonious blend of juicy black currant, candied cherry and orange blossom.

Name: Chambolle-Musigny
Wine Description: It is garnet-red in colour with blackcurrant and clove aromas on the nose. This wine is very full in the mouth with silky tannins and a pleasant persistence.

Name: Blend 25
Wine Description: Initial aromas of citrus, stone and tropical fruits come to the foreground while subtle expressions of orange blossom and honeysuckle arise.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Clear and intense ruby red. Evident fruit blends with vanilla and sweet leaf tobacco. Full and round entry, generous mid-palate, persistent and intriguingly tangy finish.

Name: Moueix Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Winery: Château La Tour du Pin Figeac

Name: Maresh Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Its utterly transparent and full of light. The colour is a youthful, delicate, very light red approaching dark pink. The nose has a smells of Hood strawberries and fresh rain on good earth.

Name: Gevrey-Chambertin
Wine Description: Red colour with purple rim. Elegant wine with a pleasant fruity taste, hints of spice and minerals. Lovely scents of fruits, spices and flowers.

Name: Pisoni Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Pisoni has a deep dark red color with a purple hue. Aromas of wild black raspberries, bittersweet chocolate, plum and roasted herbs wrapped in an intense, concentrated and full bodied wine with well integrated tannins.

Name: Solengo
Wine Description: A deep black, purple colour with a bouquet of ripe fruits, such as black currant and blackberry, infused with toasty oak. Soft on the palate with great concentration of lush fruit nicely in balance with its fine, smooth tannins. The palate finds impressive structure and complexity.

Name: Relentless
Wine Description: Aromas of meatiness along with black plum, black pepper, black fig. Smoke, forest floor and subtle black truffle the mouthfeel is seamless and round from the front of the through the finish.

Name: Command Single Vineyard Shiraz
Wine Description: Rich powerful and elegant. Deep crimson in colour. Lifted red fruits and plummy depth with hints of spicy oak aroma.Rich and attractive spicy fresh ripe berries, supported by silky tannins that together provide a focused structure, and a powerful yet elegant finish flush with fruit to balance the tannins.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Deep, saturated violet color with a blackish hue. The nose presents a wide array of dark berry fruits with notes of delicate violets flowers as well as sweet clove spices, a touch of cedar and leather. The palate offers rich cassis and black currant fruit flavors interwoven with hints of chocolate, vanilla and black pepper.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Cornelia Constanza
Winery: Domaine de la Solitude - Famille Lancon
Wine Description: Expressive nose of gooseberry and milk caramel. Mouth perfectly expressing the purity of cocoa background, cinnamon, cardamom and Sichuan pepper.

Name: San Leonardo
Wine Description: Intense ruby red with garnet highlights. A wine of remarkable intensity on the nose, which layers bell peppers and wild berries over a background note of vanilla. The palate is full, warm and impressively rounded, with intense aromatics that linger on the palate.

Name: Latchkey Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: As presence and depth in a deftly balanced package, playing the cherry, clotted cream and floral flavors against fine tannins. and an open texture, finishing with finesse.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Alluring aromas of wild berry, leather, forest floor, Mediterranean brush and a balsamic note mingle in the glass. The tight palate doles out Morello cherry, crushed raspberry, baking spice and grilled herb alongside firm tannins and vibrant acidity.

Name: Toscana Red
Wine Description: It has palate the wines shape and texture is quite striking….the entry is all silky, vivid sour cherry fruit…very focussed and at the lighter end of the medium-bodied spectrum with minerally acidity stretched over a taut canvas of savoury red-fruits with hints of polished leather, truffle, spice, herbs and violets. There is nothing bulbous on the palate….the wine is quite slender in shape, the oak, while there is judged beautifully, the tannins, chalky super-fine and ripe and the acidity is lip-smackingly sapid.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The aromas have pleasing intensity and complexity with a combination of black fruit, raspberry, cedar and spicy oak. This wine displays good structure and balance with a full, even palate. The flavors follow the aromas with added hints of ripe plum and coffee. A drinking pleasure today, it will also be pure delight in years to come.

Name: Occidental Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Gorgeous red toned aromas flesh out in an ample, pliant cinnamon orange peel white pepper and cranberry add attractive aromatic overtones the should drink well for the better part of a decade.

Name: Dry Creek Valley Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: The juicy mid palate leads into a long, spicy finish with firm tannins. Drink with a tender hangar steak.

Name: Le Dix de Los Vascos
Wine Description: Deep ruby red colour with light shades of brick. Bouquet of ripe red fruit such as plums, cherries and raspberries which blend with light notes of liqueur. Toasted notes well-integrated with flavours of black olives, black pepper, chocolate brownie, walnuts and chestnuts, with a hint of fresh figs, tobacco and cedar. The wine is full-bodied with good structure, volume and tannins.

Name: Bonne Vivante Blend
Wine Description: Rich and round, with lots of spice and black fruit followed by a creamy but driven finish. Words and flavours that come to mind while tasting are: blue fruit, silk, density, freshness, smooth and rich.

Name: MunJebel MC Rosso
Wine Description: Put the soothing warmth,opening is all an embrace of intense and measured sweetness.

Name: Zinfandel Reserve
Wine Description: If you go for a hike in the Palisades above Napa Valley, this is what the summer air smells like - sage, Manzanita and wild flowers. That multidimensional scent gives the wine a floral, spicy, aromatic complexity rarely found in Napa Valley reds. This is a lean, muscular zin...tightly focused, its ripe fruit tunneling through mineral-inflected tannins and making an imprint on the palate

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Merry Edwards' name is well known to lovers of elegant California Pinot Noir, and this Russian River Valley wine is a perfect example of the winemakers' style. Although the wine is quite refined, it's also luscious and compulsively drinkable. You may want to eat a second chicken just to justify a second bottle.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: It is growing season was near perfect, with ideal spring budbreak and warm, steady days balanced by cool nights. The steady weather continued into the fall, resulting in optimal ripening conditions at harvest. Our 2012 Mt. Brave Merlot has ripe boysenberry aromas and flavors layered with notes of Asian spice. This wine is rich in fruit and balanced by structure, minerality and acidity for a mouthwatering finish.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: The 2010 Chateauneuf du Pape is both a strong effort and a terrific value. Its dark ruby/purple color is followed by lots of loamy soil, underbrush, forest floor, kirsch, licorice and roasted meat characteris- tics. Fullbodied and layered, the wine builds incrementally in the mouth exhibiting considerable purity, length and texture. It should drink nicely for 10-15 years.

Name: Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The Sonoma Coast supplies our fruit with a gorgeous rolling fog that grants our blend a generous acidity and delicate tannins. Through the luxurious texture, you find notes of bright raspberry, summer strawberry, and gentle oak spices.

Name: Piano Montevergine Taurasi
Wine Description: Lovely ruby red color. On the nose, sensations of fruit: blackberry, plum and sour black cherry; a balsamic note, spices. The taste is soft, captivating, mineral and balanced with elegant tannins and a persistent finish.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: Deep dark red in colour. On the nose spices and mature red fruits. On the palate round tannins with powerful complexity. A rich unctuous wine with notes of mature plums, hazelnuts and red fruits. Very rich wine full of harmony and balance.

Name: Syrah
Wine Description: Exotic floral aromatics of violets, blue fruits, and sage draw you in, but it’s the rich entry on the peppery and precise palate that's a showcase of this vineyard. They complement the tightly wound but very long finish.

Name: Valadorna Toscana
Wine Description: Aromas of cherry cola andripe red fruits. On the palate, spice flavors combine with earth-driven minerality toproduce a wine with freshness and finesse. With moderate acidity, the wine reveals a supple and elegant texture with a long lasting finish and nearly undetectable tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine is soft and lush, with a perfect a balance of earthiness and dark berry flavors and aromas. The oak, tannins and acidity are perfectly balanced.

Name: Pinot Noir Block M
Wine Description: Boasting a dark crimson hue, the Block M bottling is always layered with richness. Vivid aromatics of rosemary, cinnamon stick and star lily are intertwined with the warmth of ripe persimmon, mulberry and cherry pie filling. Texturally, the wine is crisp and fresh on the palate, with an intense tannin profile that finishes with gorgeous purity and length.

Name: Four Soil Melange Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Displaying a dark crimson color, and an aroma of sweet spice, sandalwood, black cherry, and black plum. The texture is very smooth, full, and plush, with flavors of cocoa, blackberry, cassis, black plum, and Chinese five spices.
